page.title: 11Housing Survey Cont.
page.content: The most common house of all,in the roads around the school was semi -detached,2nd was the bungalow,3rd detached,4th linked,5th terraced,6th cottage. The average age was 20 to 30 years old.On the south side of Manor Playing Fields some of the houses are less than 5 years old and are still being built.Christopher Hathaway's house on the Wellsway is the oldest,and was built in 1547.In the valley opposite there is a farm house that is about 100 years old. The most common building material is {brick,}with just a few houses (the older ones)made of stone.Some were faced with{pebble dash}or{wood.}Lots of houses had been painted.Some of the houses had stone walls and large trees which means it was quite old.All the houses had gardens.
